meta.description: Example API response formats for Prestine Mobile Car Wash pricing tools
meta.purpose: These formats should be used by the AI assistant when responding to customer queries

list_packages.description: Response format when customer asks 'What services do you offer?' or 'Show me all packages'

Standard: Wash & Vacuum (Meguiar's PH balanced Shampoo for coated Vehicles)
Water Spot Remover and Glass Polish (AutoGlym)
AutoGlym: Water Spot Remover and Glass Polish

get_price.description: Response format when customer asks for a specific service price

examples.query: How much is Headlight Polish for my SUV?

response.description: Restore clarity to oxidized or yellowed headlight lenses
Premium AutoGlym wash products with interior vacuum
Professional leather cleaning, conditioning, and protection

quote_total.description: Response format when customer wants multiple services or a total quote

examples.query: I want Wash + Vacuum and Headlight Polish for my SUV
Full AutoGlym package for my Van - wash, wax, and leather treatment
Complete detailing - machine wax, wheel detailing, engine clean for Crossover

compare_packages.description: Response format when customer wants to compare Standard vs AutoGlym

example.query: What's the difference between Standard and AutoGlym wash for my Car?

comparison.description: Basic exterior wash and interior vacuum cleaning
Premium AutoGlym wash products with interior vacuum

response.recommendation: AutoGlym uses premium British-made products for superior shine and protection. Worth the extra LKR 500 for better results and longer-lasting protection.

vehicle_type_pricing.description: Response format showing all prices for a specific vehicle type

example.query: Show me all prices for my SUV

sinhala_responses.description: Example Sinhala language responses for common queries

examples.response_sinhala: ඔබේ SUV එකට Standard Wash + Vacuum එක රුපියල් 2800 යි. AutoGlym premium wash එක රුපියල් 3600 යි. කැමතිද වැඩිපුර විස්තර?
examples.response_english: For your SUV, Standard Wash + Vacuum is Rs. 2800. AutoGlym premium wash is Rs. 3600. Would you like more details?

examples.response_sinhala: Full service එකේ wash, vacuum, සහ machine wax තියෙනවා. SUV එකට Standard එක රුපියල් 6000 යි. AutoGlym premium එක රුපියල් 7500 යි.
examples.response_english: Full service includes wash, vacuum, and machine wax. For SUV, Standard is Rs. 6000. AutoGlym premium is Rs. 7500.

examples.response_sinhala: ඔව්, අපි headlight polish කරනවා. SUV එකට රුපියල් 3500 යි. මේකෙන් ඔබේ headlight වල oxidation හරි yellowing එක ඉවත් කරලා clarity ආපසු ගෙනෙනවා.
examples.response_english: Yes, we do headlight polish. For SUV it's Rs. 3500. This removes oxidation and yellowing to restore clarity.
